description: The Men's Bridger 10'' winter boot is their warmest, burliest boot, ready for any winter adventure. 400 Grams of insulation keeps your feet warm while a DWR nubuck leather upper with their waterproof B-DRY liner ensures to keep feet dry. Add a TPU Chassis, and the winterized Granite Peak Outsole will keep you on track come snow, ice, or frozen tundra.
name: Oboz Bridger 10" Insulated B-Dry - Mens
